FuncDef:
The display ifit flow-cache statistics command displays statistics in IFIT flow tables.
The display ifit forward flow-cache statistics command displays statistics in IFIT hardware flow tables. The display ifit flow-cache statistics command displays statistics in IFIT flow tables. The display ifit forward flow-cache statistics command displays statistics in IFIT hardware flow tables. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ifit forward flow-cache statistics slot <slot-id> [ chip <chip-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a chip ID.
The value is an integer. The default value is 0.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ifit forward flow-cache statistics slot 1
